Quotes_old:
America will never be destroyed
from the outside.
If we falter and lose our freedoms,
it will be because we
destroyed ourselves.

 - Abraham Lincoln

If you want to test a man's character,
give him power.

 - Abraham Lincoln

The best way to predict the future is to create it.

 - Abraham Lincoln
Quotes:

give him power.
 - Abraham Lincoln

Let us have peace.
 - Ulysses S. Grant

The best way to predict the future is to create it.
 - Abraham Lincoln

Bad promises are better broken than kept.
 - Abraham Lincoln

If men make war in slavish obedience to rules, they will fail.
 - Ulysses S. Grant

Leave nothing for tomorrow which can be done today.
 - Abraham Lincoln

We do not want to dissolve the Union; you shall not.
 - Abraham Lincoln

Don't blindly trust everything you see on the internet with a famous person behind it.
 - Abraham Lincoln
